title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Defense Institution Reform Initiative

description.narrative: Djibouti - Scoping and Logistics Development #3. Reduce U.S. Security Cooperation Friction Points; Ensure U.S. (and other donor) equipment is absorbed, sustained and utilized to minimize partner frustration and maximize Djiboutis operational and tactical effectiveness countering VEOs; Ensure the Rapid Intervention Battalion (RIB) is well developed as an institution and integrated into the Forces Armees Djiboutiennes (FAD) .

description.narrative: Djibouti - Scoping and Logistics Development #4. Provide support to Kentucky National Guard (KYNG), Djiboutis State Partner, logistics SME team.
